## LayoutStyle enumeration

用于指定布局样式。

```csharp
public enum LayoutStyle
```

### 价值观

| 姓名 | 价值 | 描述 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| FlowChart | `0` | 流程图样式. |
| CompactTree | `1` | 树样式. |
| Radial | `2` | 径向样式. |
| Circular | `3` | 圆形样式. |
